00044  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00045 
00046 !  Common Variables
00047  USE Domain
00048  USE FluidParams
00049  USE LBMParams,  ONLY : f, fbar, fdim, g, gbar, gdim
00050  USE MPIParams
00051  IMPLICIT NONE
00052 
00053  !   Input/Output Parameters
00054  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00055 
00056  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00057 
00058 ! Allocation for hydrodynamics arrays
00059    ALLOCATE(    p(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00060    ALLOCATE(  rho(xlg3:xug3,ylg3:yug3) )
00061    ALLOCATE(  psi(xlg2:xug2,ylg2:yug2) )
00062    ALLOCATE(    u(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,1:2) )
00063    ALLOCATE(   ni(xlg2:xug2,ylg2:yug2,1:4) )
00064 
00065 ! Allocation for distribution functions
00066    ALLOCATE(    f(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:fdim) )
00067    ALLOCATE(    g(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:gdim) )
00068    ALLOCATE( fbar(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:fdim) )
00069    ALLOCATE( gbar(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:gdim) )
00070 
00071 ! Allocation for differential terms
00072    ALLOCATE(  gradRhoX(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00073    ALLOCATE(  gradRhoY(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00074    ALLOCATE( gradRhoSq(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00075    ALLOCATE( gradRhoXX(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00076    ALLOCATE( gradRhoXY(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00077    ALLOCATE( gradRhoYY(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00078 
00079 ! Allocation for the exchanged data in the x direction
00080    xsize  = yu - yl + 1
00081    xsize2 = xsize + xsize
00082    xsize3 = xsize2 + xsize
00083 
00084    ALLOCATE( rho_west_snd(1:xsize3) )
00085    ALLOCATE( rho_east_snd(1:xsize3) )
00086    ALLOCATE( rho_west_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00087    ALLOCATE( rho_east_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00088 
00089    ALLOCATE( f_west_snd(1:xsize3) )
00090    ALLOCATE( f_east_snd(1:xsize3) )
00091    ALLOCATE( f_west_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00092    ALLOCATE( f_east_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00093 
00094    ALLOCATE( g_west_snd(1:xsize3) )
00095    ALLOCATE( g_east_snd(1:xsize3) )
00096    ALLOCATE( g_west_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00097    ALLOCATE( g_east_rcv(1:xsize3) )
00098 
00099 ! Allocation for the exchanged data in the y direction
00100    ysize  = xu - xl + 1
00101    ysize2 = ysize + ysize
00102    ysize3 = ysize2 + ysize
00103 
00104    ALLOCATE( rho_south_snd(1:ysize3) )
00105    ALLOCATE( rho_north_snd(1:ysize3) )
00106    ALLOCATE( rho_south_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00107    ALLOCATE( rho_north_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00108 
00109    ALLOCATE( f_south_snd(1:ysize3) )
00110    ALLOCATE( f_north_snd(1:ysize3) )
00111    ALLOCATE( f_south_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00112    ALLOCATE( f_north_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00113 
00114    ALLOCATE( g_south_snd(1:ysize3) )
00115    ALLOCATE( g_north_snd(1:ysize3) )
00116    ALLOCATE( g_south_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00117    ALLOCATE( g_north_rcv(1:ysize3) )
00118 
00119  ELSE
00120 
00121    DEALLOCATE( p )
00122    DEALLOCATE( u )
00123    DEALLOCATE( ni )
00124    DEALLOCATE( rho )
00125    DEALLOCATE( psi )
00126 
00127    DEALLOCATE( f )
00128    DEALLOCATE( g )
00129    DEALLOCATE( fbar )
00130    DEALLOCATE( gbar )
00131 
00132    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoX )
00133    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoY )
00134    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoSq )
00135    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoXX )
00136    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoXY )
00137    DEALLOCATE( gradRhoYY )
00138 
00139    DEALLOCATE( f_west_snd )
00140    DEALLOCATE( f_west_rcv )
00141    DEALLOCATE( f_east_snd )
00142    DEALLOCATE( f_east_rcv )
00143    DEALLOCATE( g_west_snd )
00144    DEALLOCATE( g_east_snd )
00145    DEALLOCATE( g_west_rcv )
00146    DEALLOCATE( g_east_rcv )
00147    DEALLOCATE( rho_west_snd )
00148    DEALLOCATE( rho_west_rcv )
00149    DEALLOCATE( rho_east_snd )
00150    DEALLOCATE( rho_east_rcv )
00151    DEALLOCATE( f_south_snd )
00152    DEALLOCATE( f_south_rcv )
00153    DEALLOCATE( f_north_snd )
00154    DEALLOCATE( f_north_rcv )
00155    DEALLOCATE( g_south_snd )
00156    DEALLOCATE( g_south_rcv )
00157    DEALLOCATE( g_north_snd )
00158    DEALLOCATE( g_north_rcv )
00159    DEALLOCATE( rho_south_snd )
00160    DEALLOCATE( rho_south_rcv )
00161    DEALLOCATE( rho_north_snd )
00162    DEALLOCATE( rho_north_rcv )
00163  END IF
00164 
00165  RETURN
00166  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
